body_html:
the first test code has sums that go to infinity, and hence this device side assert. this is expected. https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorRandom.cuh#L134
Instead of silently doing something wrong, it explicitly errors out.

body:
the first test code has sums that go to infinity, and hence this device side assert. this is expected. https://github.com/pytorch/pytorch/blob/master/torch/lib/THC/THCTensorRandom.cuh#L134
Instead of silently doing something wrong, it explicitly errors out.
